account-exists_alert.heading: Account already exists
account-exists_alert.text: You already have added this specific account. Please change its derivation path to add another address (advanced mode).

ask-permission.heading: AirGap is not persistent, secrets generated will not be stored and need to be imported again after a restart
ask-permission.text: This Distribution is intended to securely generate secrets as well as to sign transactions offline, but not for secret storage.

no-vm.heading: AirGap Vault Distribution should not be run on a virtual machine, if the host has network connectivity even if the connectivity has been turned off temporarily.
no-vm.text: Make sure that the client is disconnected from any network before you generate a new secret or import an existing one.

local-authentication-onboarding.heading: Your secret is accessed with your defined authentication method like fingerprint, face id or pin code.
local-authentication-onboarding.text: Your secret needs to be accessed for account creation and transaction signing.

secret-generate-onboarding.heading: AirGap is going to ask you for camera and microphone permission, to allow a secure secret generation.
secret-generate-onboarding.text: Both permissions are used in order to generate a more secure secret for you.

highest.label: Highest Security
highest.text: With the AirGap two device approach secure key handling becomes more accessible.

medium.label: Medium Security
medium.text: With the AirGap two app approach secure key handling becomes more accessible.

vault.heading: AirGap Vault
vault.text: The private key is generated and securely stored in the AirGap Vault app.You have to install AirGap Vault to use AirGap Wallet

wallet.heading: AirGap Wallet
wallet.text: The wallet application deals only with public information and is responsible for broadcasting transactions to the blockchain.

secret-create.heading: Let's setup AirGap!
secret-create.text: Do you want to create a new secret or import an existing one?

generate.label: Generate
generate.text: Create a new secret with our secure process to make sure your funds are really safe.

import.label: Import
import.text: Import your existing secret to AirGap and create safe transactions.

social-recovery.label: Social Recovery
social-recovery.text: Recover a lost private key from your social contact's secret shares.

secret-edit.title: Your Secret
secret-edit.text: Give your secret a name and select the security level.

security-level.heading: Security Level
security-level.text: You can encrypt your key additionally using a passcode.

passcode.label: Passcode
passcode.text: Set a passcode for your accounts.

secret-recovery.heading: Secret Recovery
secret-recovery.text: You can set up your secret recovery mechanisms after the initial setup.

social-recovery.label: Social Recovery
social-recovery.text:
Generate a number of secret shares
to distribute to social contacts.

interaction.label: Vault and Wallet interaction
interaction.text: Select whether Vault and Wallet are installed on the same device or on separate devices.

secret-edit-delete-popover.title: Confirm Secret Removal
secret-edit-delete-popover.text: Do you want to remove this secret? You won't be able to restore it without backup!

secret-generate.heading: We're generating your secret.
secret-generate.text: For this we use your video, audio, touch and device acceleration to add additional entropy to your secret.
secret-generate.description: Move your device around to record audio, video & acceleration until all shields are full.

secret-import.title: Import secret
secret-import.text: You can import an existing secret to AirGap. Fill in the words from your secret.
secret-import.warning: Please double-check the spelling of your mnemonic.

secret-rules.title: Read carefully
secret-rules.heading: Make sure you follow these rules
secret-rules.text: We've generated your secret, it's a sequence of words.
secret-rules.description: Make sure you understand these rules that ensure you will always have safe access to your accounts.

rules-list.item-1_text: Make sure you write these words down on a piece of paper.
rules-list.item-2_text: You have to strictly follow the sequence.
rules-list.item-3_text: Check the spelling of each word.
rules-list.item-4_text: Keep the piece of paper in a safe place.
rules-list.item-5_text: Under no circumstance take a screenshot or photo and do not photoscan it.
rules-list.item-6_text: Never upload your key anywhere to the cloud.

secret-show.title: This is your recovery phrase
secret-show.text: Write down each word on a piece of paper, remember to follow the rules.

too-fast_alert.title: That was fast!
too-fast_alert.heading: Are you sure you are not a super human?
too-fast_alert.text: Make sure that you followed all the rules and didn't do anything other than writing your secret on paper.

secret-validate.title: Verify your recovery phrase
secret-validate.text: Match the order of your recovery phrase by selecting the correct words.

secret-wallet-interaction.title: Wallet Interaction
secret-wallet-interaction.same-device_heading: Looks like you're using AirGap Vault and AirGap Wallet on the same device.
secret-wallet-interaction.offline-device_heading: Looks like youâ€™re using AirGap Vault on an offline device.
secret-wallet-interaction.text: You can define where you have AirGap Wallet installed to make the interaction with the Vault a bit simpler.

selector.same-device: Vault and Wallet on the same device

secret-wallet-interaction.description: You can always change your preference in the Settings Tab

verify-key.incorrect_text:
Your secret does not match the generated one. Make sure you've chosen the correct words.
To correct mistakes, simply select a wrong word and choose the correct one.
verify-key.success_text: You have successfully verified this secret.

social-recovery-import.title: Social Recovery
social-recovery-import.text: In order to recover your secret from your shares, indicate with how many shares you wish to recover your secret. Keep in mind that you will only be able to successfully recover your secret if you have as many shares for recovery as you have defined in the set up of social recovery.

social-recovery-setup.title: Social Recovery
social-recovery-setup.text: With Social Recovery you can create secret shares and distribute them to social contacts you trust. You can recover a lost secret if you have a set number of these secret shares.

secret-shares.label: Secret Shares
secret-shares.text: You can define the amount of shares you wish to generate and the number of shares necessary for a successful recovery of your secret.

social-recovery-setup.shares-recovery_label: Number of shares needed for recovery

social-recovery-show-share.title: Social Recovery
social-recovery-show-share.text: Write down each word on a piece of paper, remember to follow all the rules.

social-recovery-validate-share.title: Social Recovery
social-recovery-validate-share.text: Tap each word to match the correct order:

tab-scan.title: QR Code Scanner
tab-scan.text: Scan a QR Code from AirGap Wallet
tab-scan.empty-state_heading: In order to scan QR codes, AirGap Vault needs the camera permission.

tab-wallets.title: Accounts
tab-wallets.empty-state_text: Create a new account by selecting a currency and sync it to AirGap Wallet.

incompatible-qr_alert.title: Incompatible QR
incompatible-qr_alert.text: This QR is not a raw transaction.

no-secret_alert.title: No secret found
no-secret_alert.text: You do not have any compatible account for this public key in AirGap. Please import your secret and create the corresponding account to sign this transaction.

transaction-broadcast-selection.title: Send To Wallet
transaction-broadcast-selection.heading: Transaction signed. Select how you want to send it to AirGap Wallet.
transaction-broadcast-selection.same-device_info: AirGap Vault and AirGap Wallet are installed on the same device.
transaction-broadcast-selection.offline-device_info: AirGap Vault is installed on an offline device, scan the QR code with AirGap Wallet.

transaction-signed.title: Signed Transaction
transaction-signed.heading: This is your signed transaction, scan it with AirGap Wallet.

copy-address_modal.text: Address was copied to your clipboard

wallet-sync-selection.title: Sync Account
wallet-sync-selection.heading: How do you want to sync this account with AirGap Wallet?
wallet-sync-selection.same-device_info: AirGap Vault and AirGap Wallet are installed on the same device.
wallet-sync-selection.offline-device_info: AirGap Vault is installed on an offline device, scan the QR code with AirGap Wallet.

wallet-edit-delete-popover.confirm_address_copy: Address was copied to your clipboard
wallet-edit-delete-popover.confirm_sync_code_copy: Sync code was copied to your clipboard

account-removal_alert.title: Confirm Account Removal
account-removal_alert.text: Do you want to remove this account? You can always add it back later, if you know its correct derivation path/coin!

wallet-share.title: Sync Account
wallet-share.heading: This is your Sync QR code, scan it with AirGap Wallet.
wallet-share.text: This QR includes your extended public key, public address and your type of coin. Do not share it publicly!

disclaimer.title: AirGap Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: You as the user hereby accept and acknowledge this protocol and all the information provided within to the fullest extent. You as the user confirm that the content this document has been reviewed, tested and understood on their own behalf.

disclaimer-list.text: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law:
disclaimer-list.item-1_text: All services provided by Papers GmbH, its employees, freelancers or other subcontractors are provided without representation and warranty of any kind
disclaimer-list.item-2_text: Papers GmbH disclaims any and all direct and indirect liability for damage occurring under, or in connection with, this Protocol, especially, but not limited to loss of, or damage to, data, lost profit, compromised / hacked product or system, and or stolen / missing monetary funds.

disclaimer.description: You understand the risks involved in this software, including but no limited to losing your secret, thus private keys and access to your funds.
